mathequation.instructions: Double tap to view math in full screen
popupbutton.instructions: Double tap to activate the picker
custom.actions.hint: Swipe up or down to select a custom action
draggable.instructions: Double tap and hold, wait for the sound, then drag to re-arrange
adjustable.instructions: Swipe up or down with one finger to adjust the value.
table.index.instructions: Double tap and hold, then move up and down to select index
